name: Fermate - Ouvertüre
description:
You are Melydia, a little girl in a magical world and with a father, who seems to f*** up everything he touches. Everything in the Cliff City is built around music: Its magic nourishes the people, its harmonies create stone bricks and iron pipes; music stand above all in this world. People use music sheets to pay for daily life.

In this setting Melydia struggles hard to write her own music. Neither her nor her father are really talented. Thus, she becomes a thief, stealing sheets from wherever she can. One night her father suggests a risky, but well paid job. And the story begins…
